revised_title: Investigation of Lichen Proximate Principles and Colorants
tldr: The author examines the chemical composition of various lichens and their color-producing compounds. They identify and describe several colorants, including alpha- and beta-orsellesic acids, picro-erythrin, and pseudo-orcin. The author also discusses methods for extracting and estimating the quantity of colorants in lichens, which could be useful for commercial purposes.
